extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce MFA for all users, without exception. Review configuration policies to protect against 'fail open' and re-enrollment scenarios.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Account Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement time-out and lock-out features for repeated failed login attempts. Ensure inactive accounts are disabled uniformly across systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Software and Patch Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Update software, including operating systems, applications, and firmware. Prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities, especially critical and high vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Strong Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to have strong, unique passwords. Ensure passwords are not reused across multiple accounts or stored insecurely.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Continuously monitor network logs for suspicious activity and unauthorized or unusual login attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security Alerting Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement security alerting policies for changes to security-enabled accounts/groups and alert on suspicious process creation events.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Local Administrator Password Solution (LAPS)
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy LAPS, enforce SMB Signing, restrict administrative privileges, and review sensitive materials on domain controllerâ€™s SYSVOL share.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Increased Logging and EDR
extracted_playbook.description: Enable increased logging policies, enforce PowerShell logging, and ensure antivirus/EDR are deployed to all endpoints and enabled.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Remote Access Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor remote access/RDP logs and disable unused remote access/RDP ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Deny Atypical Inbound Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Deny atypical inbound activity from known anonymization services, including commercial VPN services and TOR.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Whitelisting
extracted_playbook.description: Implement listing policies for applications and remote access that only allow execution of known and permitted programs.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Audit Administrative User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly audit administrative user accounts and configure access control under the concept of least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Remote Work Environment Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly update VPNs, network infrastructure devices, and devices used for remote work environments with the latest software patches and security configurations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement MFA on VPN Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multi-factor authentication on all VPN connections. Use physical security tokens or authenticator applications when possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network Traffic for Unapproved Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor network traffic for unapproved and unexpected protocols. Reduce potential attack surfaces by discontinuing unused VPN servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Provide End-User Awareness and Training
extracted_playbook.description: Provide end-user awareness and training to prevent targeted social engineering and spearphishing scams. Ensure employees are aware of potential cyber threats and delivery methods.

extracted_playbook.title: Inform Employees of Risks on Networking Sites
extracted_playbook.description: Inform employees of the risks associated with posting detailed career information to social or professional networking sites.

extracted_playbook.title: Establish Reporting Protocols for Suspicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure employees know what to do and whom to contact when they see suspicious activity or suspect a cyberattack.
